column4: i need help with graphics on ubuntu 7.10, anyone able to "lend a hand"? :P
anyone able to help with graphics issues?
Sure can try.. what video card?
atm i have radeon 3870, but this is mainly for my gaming partition of windows
my main problem is that i try to configure resolution from ubuntu from an app in "system" tab, and it just makes my screen go weird
Is this a desktop or laptop
HAve you gone to system admin restricted drivers manager?

The way to get that back.. is to use recovery mode.. sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg  select vesa as your card type and 1024 max, that will give you basic gui functions to continue unless something else has happened.
i should launch recovery mode and do that?
Please also note.. avoid scripts like automatix and to alesser extent envy
Sorry, yes, use recovery mode and try that command, use tab to bypass any other options  or just hit enter as needed, try not to change anything else for now..
What type of scripts are you planning on editing.
i thought it was obvious since i said devcpp, c/c++ code
I am quite busy.  I didnt catch that.
gedit highlights bash and py scripts
PLease go there if you cant stay on topic and keep it civil
